org.jvnet.inflector

Class Noun

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jvnet.inflector.Noun

  • public class Noun
extends Object

    A Noun represents the grammatical part of speech that refers to a person, place, thing, event, substance, quality or idea.

    This class contains a number of static convenience methods (pluralOf(String) for forming plurals.

    Author:
    Tom White

      • pluralizer

        public static Pluralizer pluralizer()

        Creates a new Pluralizer instance for the default locale.

        Returns:
        a pluralizer instance for the default locale

      • pluralizer

        public static Pluralizer pluralizer(Locale locale)

        Creates a new Pluralizer instance for the specified locale.

        Parameters:
        locale - the locale specifying the language of the pluralizer
        Returns:
        a pluralizer instance for the specified locale, or null if there is none for this locale

      • pluralOf

        public static String pluralOf(String word)

        Converts a noun to its plural form using the Pluralizer for the default locale.

        The return value is not defined if this method is passed a plural form.

        Parameters:
        word - a singular form
        Returns:
        the plural form

      • pluralOf

        public static String pluralOf(String word,
              int number)

        Converts a noun to its plural form for the given number of instances using the Pluralizer for the default locale.

        The return value is not defined if this method is passed a plural form.

        Parameters:
        word - a singular form
        number - the number of objects being referred to in the plural
        Returns:
        the plural form

      • pluralOf

        public static String pluralOf(String word,
              Locale locale)

        Converts a noun to its plural form using the Pluralizer for the given locale.

        The return value is not defined if this method is passed a plural form.

        Parameters:
        word - a singular form
        locale - the locale specifying the language of the pluralizer
        Returns:
        the plural form

      • pluralOf

        public static String pluralOf(String word,
              int number,
              Locale locale)

        Converts a noun to its plural form for the given number of instances using the Pluralizer for the given locale.

        The return value is not defined if this method is passed a plural form.

        Parameters:
        word - a singular form
        number - the number of objects being referred to in the plural
        locale - the locale specifying the language of the pluralizer
        Returns:
        the plural form

      • pluralOf

        public static String pluralOf(String word,
              Pluralizer pluralizer)

        Converts a noun to its plural form using the given Pluralizer.

        The return value is not defined if this method is passed a plural form.

        Parameters:
        word - a singular form
        pluralizer - a noun pluralizer
        Returns:
        the plural form

      • pluralOf

        public static String pluralOf(String word,
              int number,
              Pluralizer pluralizer)

        Converts a noun to its plural form for the given number of instances using the given Pluralizer.

        The return value is not defined if this method is passed a plural form.

        Parameters:
        word - a singular form
        number - the number of objects being referred to in the plural
        pluralizer - a noun pluralizer
        Returns:
        the plural form
